\section{network\_simulator module}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Network Simulator

\sphinxAtStartPar
Implements a network simulator that can drop and corrupt packets.
\index{NetworkSimulator (class in network\_simulator)@\spxentry{NetworkSimulator}\spxextra{class in network\_simulator}}
